name: Paper-instruments
tagline: Prototyping on Paper (https://popapp.in/) clone for the desktop + mouse tracking
body:
### paper-instruments

A better description coming soon... here are the pages that are interesting at the moment:

[preview](http://yasashiku.github.io/paper-instruments/preview.html): Simply interact with the prototype. Hold down the space bar to see what hot spots exist.

[state](http://yasashiku.github.io/paper-instruments/state.html): Visualization of the process that the prototype imposes on the user. In addition to interacting with the prototype directly, you can jump to states by double-clicking on nodes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
